metadata.title: CVE-2021-33900 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: While investigating DIRSTUDIO-1219 it was noticed that configured StartTLSencryption was not applied when any SASL authentication mechanism(DIGEST-MD5, GSSAPI) was used. While investigating DIRSTUDIO-1220 it wasnoticed that any configured SASL confidentiality layer was not applied.This issue affects Apache Directory Studio version 2.0.0.v20210213-M16 andprior versions.

criterions.comment: apache-directory-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
